name: FB fixed navbar
body:
# FB fixed navbar

This tiny extensions freezes the left navigation pane on Facebook so that it is always visible no matter how far you scroll in your news feed.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/XRw3irWK_fs" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Download at [Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hijonlkmghfbdpcmbimegkoogkfpckkl)  
Source code available at [GitHub](https://github.com/philipp94831/FB-fixed-navbar)

***

Changelog:

0.0.3:
- Bugfixes

0.0.1:
- First release
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
